abilities.name: Xirat’p’s Sorcerous Barrages
abilities.rule: At the end of your Movement phase, roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of this model: on a 2-3, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 4-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: P’tarix’s Sorcerous Syphon
abilities.rule: While an enemy unit is within 12" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a Psychic Attack, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
